video.title: Transporter: The Series
video.synopsis: This action series picks up where the "Transporter" films left off, following driver-for-hire Frank Martin on his dangerous missions around the world.

episodes.synopsis: While delivering a prototype of an eco-friendly engine to an auto show, Frank must dodge a hit man hired by industry insiders.
episodes.title: Trojan Horsepower

episodes.synopsis: Frank faces the wrath of a Russian gangster after the package of drugs he was hired to transport is stolen.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: Frank is hired to transport a young socialite to safety when her father, a former Army general, angers a German crime boss.
episodes.title: The General's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Frank faces a moral dilemma when he goes against protocol and opens a package, revealing a strange piece of cargo.
episodes.title: Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Frank reunites with his old CIA instructor, Jack Perkins, who's looking to clear his name after being framed by a mole.
episodes.title: Dead Drop

episodes.synopsis: Frank is ambushed after picking up a data drive containing sensitive information about a businessman's involvement in the blood diamond trade.
episodes.title: Hot Ice

episodes.synopsis: Frank is embroiled in a series of bizarre events in Toronto, where he finds himself arrested for murder and thrown in jail.
episodes.title: Give the Guy a Hand

episodes.synopsis: Frank faces competition from two other transporters as the three of them race to see who can deliver a million euros to Marseille the fastest.
episodes.title: Sharks

episodes.synopsis: With the police in hot pursuit, Frank races to deliver a package to Paris, but his plans change when he learns what it contains.
episodes.title: City of Love

episodes.synopsis: While transporting a priceless painting to an art collector, Frank is held up by a woman with a gun who claims that the painting belongs to her.
episodes.title: The Switch

episodes.synopsis: Frank races against time when he delivers a stolen microchip that will blow up if he doesn't meet his deadline.
episodes.title: 12 Hours

episodes.synopsis: Frank has to deliver a difficult young hacker to a stock trader, but his mission gets complicated when Carla is put in danger.
episodes.title: Cherchez La Femme
